Specify current severity: The minimum level of severity is based on the frequency of episodes of binge eating (see below). The level of severity may be increased to reflect other symptoms and the degree of functional disability. Mild: 1–3 binge-eating episodes per week. Moderate: 4–7 binge-eating episodes per week. Severe: 8–13 binge-eating episodes per week. Extreme: 14 or more binge-eating episodes per week.
